channel.title: Fixing items. Please help me
channel.description:
Well, for example: Dragon Full Helm is in the wrong slot. How can I move it?
Help me please?

item.title: Fixing items. Please help me
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Very easily. Open up your server folder. Look for the Item ID in Item.java and Item4.java If your server does not have Item4.java Then simply look in Item.java for this. Here, a Mini-TuT for both

TuT for Item.java and Item4.java

Step 1: Open up your Server Folder.
Step 2: Search around for Item.java
Step 3: Open your Item.java and look for the Item ID that your looking for.
Step 4: If its in any other slot besides the want e.g. Dragon Full Helm. Delete that ID FROM THAT LIST!
Step 5: (Still in Item.java) Search for fullMask, fullHelm, and (Maybe)Hat.
Step 6: Insert the ID INTO! fullMask, fullHelm, and (Maybe)Hat ONLY!
Step 7: (In Item4.java) Repeat steps 1-6.

TuT for Item.java ONLY!

Repeat steps 1-6.

Read full topic
